programRules.condition:
!d2:hasValue(#{screening_type}) || 

(#{screening_type} == 'HPV' &&
(!d2:hasValue(#{hpv_dna_test_result}) || #{hpv_dna_test_result} != 'Positive' ||
!d2:hasValue(#{hpv_genotyping_is_performed}) || !#{hpv_genotyping_is_performed} ||
!d2:hasValue(#{hpv_genotype}) || #{hpv_genotype} != 'Other high risk HPV subtypes' ||
!d2:hasValue(#{triage_is_performed}) || !#{triage_is_performed} ||
!d2:hasValue(#{triage_test_type}) ||
(#{triage_test_type} == 'VIA' && (!d2:hasValue(#{via_screening_result}) || 
#{via_screening_result} == 'VIA negative' ||
(#{via_screening_result} != 'VIA negative' && #{referral_for_via_positive_result} != 'Other gynecological issues'))) ||
(#{triage_test_type} == 'Cytology' && (#{pap_smear_result} == 'Pap smear negative' || #{pap_smear_result} == 'CIN I' || #{pap_smear_result} == 'Invasive cancer' || #{pap_smear_result} == 'Result pending' || #{pap_smear_result} == 'ASCUS' || #{pap_smear_result} == 'ASC_H')))) ||

(#{screening_type} == 'Pap smear' && (#{pap_smear_result} == 'Pap smear negative' || #{pap_smear_result} == 'CIN I' || #{pap_smear_result} == 'Invasive cancer' || #{pap_smear_result} == 'Result pending' || #{pap_smear_result} == 'ASCUS' || #{pap_smear_result} == 'ASC_H')) ||

(#{screening_type} == 'VIA' && (
!d2:hasValue(#{via_screening_result}) || 
#{via_screening_result} == 'VIA negative' ||
(#{via_screening_result} != 'VIA negative' && #{referral_for_via_positive_result} != 'Other gynecological issues')))

programRules.condition:
!d2:hasValue(#{screening_type}) ||  

#{screening_type} == 'VIA' || 

(#{screening_type} == 'Pap smear' && (#{pap_smear_result} == 'Other' || #{pap_smear_result} == 'Result pending' || (#{pap_smear_result} == 'CIN I' && 
((d2:hasValue(A{dob_of_the_patient}) && d2:yearsBetween(A{dob_of_the_patient}, V{enrollment_date}) <= 49) || 
(d2:hasValue(A{age_of_the_patient}) && A{age_of_the_patient} <= 49))))) ||

(#{screening_type} == 'HPV' &&
(!d2:hasValue(#{hpv_dna_test_result}) || #{hpv_dna_test_result} != 'Positive' ||
!d2:hasValue(#{hpv_genotyping_is_performed}) || !#{hpv_genotyping_is_performed} ||
!d2:hasValue(#{hpv_genotype}) ||

(#{hpv_genotype} == 'Other high risk HPV subtypes' &&
(!d2:hasValue(#{triage_is_performed}) || !#{triage_is_performed} ||
!d2:hasValue(#{triage_test_type}) || #{triage_test_type} != 'Cytology' ||

!d2:hasValue(#{pap_smear_result}) || 

#{pap_smear_result} == 'Other' || 
#{pap_smear_result} == 'Result pending' || 
(#{pap_smear_result} == 'CIN I' && (
(d2:hasValue(A{dob_of_the_patient}) && d2:yearsBetween(A{dob_of_the_patient}, V{enrollment_date}) <= 49) || 
(d2:hasValue(A{age_of_the_patient}) && A{age_of_the_patient} <= 49)
))))))

!d2:hasValue(#{triage_is_performed}) || !#{triage_is_performed})) ||

programRules.name: HIDE: Reason for referral for Positive VIA screening result
programRules.condition:
!d2:hasValue(#{screening_type}) ||  
#{screening_type} == 'Pap smear' ||
#{screening_type} == 'HPV' &&
(!d2:hasValue(#{hpv_dna_test_result}) || #{hpv_dna_test_result} != 'Positive' ||
!d2:hasValue(#{hpv_genotyping_is_performed}) || !#{hpv_genotyping_is_performed} ||
!d2:hasValue(#{hpv_genotype}) ||

(#{hpv_genotype} == 'Other high risk HPV subtypes' &&
(!d2:hasValue(#{triage_is_performed}) || !#{triage_is_performed} ||
!d2:hasValue(#{triage_test_type}) || #{triage_test_type} != 'VIA' ||
!d2:hasValue(#{via_screening_result}) || #{via_screening_result} == 'VIA negative'
)) ||
(#{hpv_genotype} == 'High risk HPV 16 and 18' &&
(!d2:hasValue(#{via_assessment_for_treatment_performed}) || !#{via_assessment_for_treatment_performed} ||
!d2:hasValue(#{via_assessment_for_treatment_result}) || #{via_assessment_for_treatment_result} != 'Eligible for Thermocoagulation'
))) || 
(#{screening_type} == 'VIA' &&
(!d2:hasValue(#{via_screening_result}) || #{via_screening_result} == 'VIA negative'))

VALIDATE: Parity < 30
VALIDATE: Parity >= parity at previous visit
programRules.description: Parity is an incremental number and cannot be less than the value at the previous visit

programRules.name: VALIDATION: Age of patient  > 99 years
programRules.description: The age of the patient is must be less or equal to 99 years

programRules.name: VALIDATION: Age of patient < 15 years
programRules.description: The age of the patient must be equal or greater than 15 years

programRules.name: VALIDATION: Age of patient >= 15 years AND < 20 years
programRules.description: The age of the patient is greater than 15 years, but less than 20 years

programRules.name: VALIDATION: DOB of patient => 15 years
programRules.description: The age of the patient must be equal or greater than 15 years

programRules.name: VALIDATION: Format of DOB in the National ID
programRules.description: The first 6-digits in the national id MUST be a valid DOB
programRules.condition:
(d2:substring(A{namibia_national_id}, 2, 2) >= 1 && d2:substring(A{namibia_national_id}, 2, 2) <= 12) &&
((d2:substring(A{namibia_national_id}, 2, 2) == 2 && (d2:modulus(d2:substring(A{namibia_national_id}, 0, 2), 4) == 0 && d2:modulus(d2:substring(A{namibia_national_id}, 0, 2), 100) != 0 || d2:modulus(d2:substring(A{namibia_national_id}, 0, 2), 400) == 0) &&
 d2:substring(A{namibia_national_id}, 4, 2) <= 29) || 
(d2:substring(A{namibia_national_id}, 2, 2) == 2 && d2:substring(A{namibia_national_id}, 4, 2) <= 28) ||
((d2:substring(A{namibia_national_id}, 2, 2) == '04' || d2:substring(A{namibia_national_id}, 2, 2) == '06' || d2:substring(A{namibia_national_id}, 2, 2) == '09' || d2:substring(A{namibia_national_id}, 2, 2) == '11') && d2:substring(A{namibia_national_id}, 4, 2) <= 30) ||
(d2:substring(A{namibia_national_id}, 2, 2) != '02' && d2:substring(A{namibia_national_id}, 2, 2) != '04' && 
d2:substring(A{namibia_national_id}, 2, 2) != '06' && d2:substring(A{namibia_national_id}, 2, 2) != '09' && 
d2:substring(A{namibia_national_id}, 2, 2) != '11') && 
d2:substring(A{namibia_national_id}, 4, 2) <= 31)

programRules.name: VALIDATION: Format of the National ID
programRules.description: The 11-digit national id starts with a non-zero digit and without spaces

programRules.name: VALIDATION: Format of the Phone Number 081*, 083* or 085*
programRules.description: The 10-digit phone number must have the format: '081xxxxxxx', '083xxxxxxx' or '085xxxxxxx'

programRules.name: VALIDATION: Format of the client ART Number to be 12 or 14 digits
programRules.description: The ART Number is composed of 12 or 14 digits

programRules.name: VALIDATION: Format of the client ART Number to be 12 or 14 digits [SCR]
VALIDATION: Month and Year of HIV diagnosis
programRules.description: The Month and Year should be in the format 'mm-yyyy'

programRules.name: VALIDATION: Month and Year of HIV diagnosis [SCR]
VALIDATION: Update the HIV Status in the patient's profile
programRules.description: Reminder to the entrant to update the HIV Status in the patient's profile when a previously negative status changes to positive

programRules.name: VALIDATION: [LAB] Specimen collection date <= test result date
programRules.description: Specimen collection date cannot be greater than test result date
